title: Israel leader vows to ‘demolish’ Hamas amid preparations to move into Gaza
description: Israel has told Palestinians to evacuate south in the Gaza Strip.

title: Egypt’s leader incorrectly claims his country never persecuted Jewish people
description: President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi’s comments to Secretary of State Antony Blinken directly contradict history.

title: Transatlantic blame game: Trump, Merkel, Biden and the danger of Germany’s dependence on Huawei
description: Donald Trump tried to prod Germany to ban the Chinese tech giant, but former Chancellor Angela Merkel defied him. As Germany grows increasingly anxious about China, Biden is trying to do the same with Merkel’s successor.

title: Opposition wins Polish election, according to exit poll
description: If vote counting confirms the result, it would mark a dramatic change of direction after a very hard-fought election campaign.

title: Nadia El-Nakla says UK is ‘enabling’ Israel
description: Her parents still trapped in Gaza, wife of Scottish First Minister Humza Yousaf says British government is 'gaslighting us at the same time.'

title: ‘I only knew that from the Nazis’: Israeli forensic experts identify tortured and burned bodies
description: Experts say they have found evidence of decapitation, rape and people being burned alive.

title: The Week… Israel went to war
Blinken warned lawmakers Azerbaijan may invade Armenia in coming weeks
description: He also said State isn’t planning to renew a long-standing waiver that allows the US to provide military assistance to Baku.

title: SNP pledges to push for independence if it wins a majority in next election
description: The strategy is aimed at holding off the resurgent Scottish Labour Party.

title: EU issues fresh statement amid divisions on Israel crisis
description: Statement comes ahead of Tuesday's meeting of EU leaders on the Middle East war.

title: Israel says it has killed a top Hamas commander
description: “We did not ask for this war, but we will win it,” an IDF spokesperson said.

title: China says Israel’s actions go beyond self-defense: Report
description: China’s official news agency reported on a diplomatic conversation with Saudi Arabia.

title: Putin to meet Xi in China this week
description: Moscow confirms Russian president's attendance at the event to mark a decade of the Belt and Road Initiative.

title: How hackers piled onto the Israeli-Hamas conflict
description: Lower-level cyberattacks are becoming a major feature of the war between Israel and Hamas, and the attacks could ramp up in intensity.

title: EU triples funding to Gaza amid Israel crisis
description: Announcement comes as EU tries to forge united front on Israel following week of mixed messaging.

title: Biden speaks with Netanyahu, Abbas
description: In both calls, Biden emphasized the need to prevent the conflict from expanding, reflecting widespread concern that other parties might jump into the war.
